name: Michael Anokye
introText: A Multi-faceted software engineer who is knowledgeable in

projects.title: Evently WebApp
projects.description: A webapp for users to book and manage events
features: Users can sign up/in
Users can book events.
Users can create events.
Users can cancel events.

projects.title: Wander WebApp
projects.description: A webapp for users that wander and find new places.
features: Users can search for tours in every state in the USA
New users can sign up to book tours.
Old users can sign in too book tours.
A registered user can become a guide by posting a tour.

projects.title: UpLift WebApp
projects.description: A webapp to make mentorship accessible to users.
features: Users can sign up/sign in.
Users can post something.
Users can comment on posts
Users can send messages

projects.title: Oper Dashboard
projects.description: A dashboard to log and generate error reports.
features: Users can log an error.
Users can view all operations.
Users are presented with 2 charts.
Users can add a user and an operation.
Users can generate a .csv file report.

projects.title: Private Chat App
projects.description: A webapp for users to instantly chat, privately.
features: Users can register.
Users can create a room.
Any user with a room name can join room.
Users are alerted when others join and/or leave.

projects.title: Covid-19 Tracker
features: Users can get global statistics.
Users can get country-specific statistics.
Users can see the trend of cases over time.
Users can compare statistics between countries.

moreProjects.title: News App
moreProjects.description: A webapp that fetches the latest news from Hacker News API.
features: Users can go to a news story.
Web app has an infinity scroll.

moreProjects.title: PDF Generator
moreProjects.description: A webapp that generates a pdf file with user input.
features: Users can generator pdf files by providing inputs
A clean pdf file is generated for users

moreProjects.title: Park Finder WebApp
moreProjects.description: An adventure driven web-app that searches for parks.
features: Gets weather at the current location
Gets parks near user current location
User can search for parks anywhere
Results of user search is displayed with the weather

moreProjects.title: Calorie Counter
moreProjects.description: A webapp for users to keep track of calorie intake.
features: Users can register.
Users are provided BMI from user info.
Users are provided a barchart for calories consumed.

moreProjects.title: Chuck Norris Jokes
moreProjects.description: A webapp that generates random Chuck Norris Jokes.
features: Users select a category of jokes.
Users can go to the next random joke.
Users can view the developer.

moreProjects.title: Advicely App
moreProjects.description: A webapp that generates random advice.
features: Users are provided a random advice when page loads.
Users can go to the next random advice.
Users can go to the developers portfolio.

moreProjects.title: RGB Game
moreProjects.description: A game for users to better understand RGB.
features: Displays a color in RGB
User clicks on a color to choose
User is prompted with results after each click
Game can be restarted by user when ended.

moreProjects.title: Unit Converter
moreProjects.description: A react converter that converts temperatures and volumes.
features: Users can choose unit to convert.
User is provided with options to convert.
User is provided with the correct answer.
Student input is verified.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.quote: As a seasoned Cloud Engineer and Full Stack Developer, I am dedicated to empowering aspiring technologists by creating accessible learning platforms that provide mentorship and guidance for those seeking careers in tech. With extensive experience in building scalable cloud-based applications, API development, and infrastructure automation, I leverage my expertise across AWS, Azure, and GCP to democratize opportunities through mobile and internet-based solutions. As a certified professional with a passion for continuous learning, I thrive in collaborative environments, where I can contribute to impactful projects and uplift others along the way.
more: With a deep passion for cloud engineering and full stack development, I have cultivated a comprehensive understanding of both software and hardware, which has enabled me to build efficient, scalable, and secure cloud-based solutions. Over the past several years, I have gained extensive experience working on large-scale applications, specializing in cloud architecture, API development, and infrastructure automation.

I have over 5 years of experience across various domains, including cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and GCP, and in developing RESTful and SOAP APIs. My technical expertise spans React.js, Node.js, Python, and SQL, and I leverage tools like Terraform, Ansible, and Jenkins for Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and CI/CD pipelines.

As a Senior Software Engineer at Data Storage Science, I architected and maintained big data-driven applications for the US Patent & Trademark Office (USPTO). I designed and deployed cloud solutions across AWS, Azure, and GCP to enhance operational performance and scalability. I also developed and managed CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions, reducing operational bottlenecks by 35%. My work ensured FedRAMP compliance through automated security checks and infrastructure provisioning using Terraform and Ansible.

At Dallas Morning News, as a Senior Full Stack Engineer, I built and maintained the digital newsroom platform using React.js, Node.js, and AWS. I automated deployment pipelines with Terraform, Ansible, and Jenkins to improve feature release times and maintain security compliance. I also developed REST APIs and real-time monitoring dashboards using Splunk and Elasticsearch to optimize performance and provide insights into system operations.

During my time at Legal General America, I contributed to the development and maintenance of in-house applications using Node.js and React.js, while also managing PostgreSQL databases. I automated redundant processes with custom error logging and reporting systems to streamline troubleshooting and improve efficiency.

At Digital Realty, as the Lead Remote Hands Technician, I advised clients like PNC, Starbucks, and Symantec on hardware configurations and deployment. I also played a key role in ensuring mission-critical infrastructure uptime by monitoring data center systems and resolving hardware and network issues.

Outside of work, I am passionate about staying active and creative. When I am not coding, you can find me painting or in the gym. I hope you enjoy exploring my portfolio, and please feel free to reach out for any inquiries.

section1.title: Summary
section1.text: Solutions-focused Cloud Engineer and Full Stack Developer with years of experience in building scalable, secure, and efficient cloud-based applications. Proficient in AWS, Azure, and GCP platforms, leveraging Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like T erraform, CloudFormation, and Ansible to deploy and maintain cloud infrastructures. Experienced in developing RESTful and SOAP APIs, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and using tools like React.js, Node.js, Python, and MySQL. Skilled in optimizing systems for performance and scalability, ensuring compliance with FedRAMP and NIST standards.

section2.title: SKILLS
list1: Extensive knowledge in HTML, CSS, Ruby, PHP, JavaScript, React.js, Node.js etc.
Extensive knowledge in Databases; MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Oracle DB, MySQL etc
Experience scripting in python, batch and bash
list2: Experience working with Git and Github
Experience with testing technologies such as Mocha, Chai, Jasmine, Karma, Webpack, Browserify, Heroku, Enzyme.
